about_the_game:
【⚠Caution】

※Note that this game is suitable for players who like gore and Ryona.

※This game will contains a lot of extremely bloody and violent content. The heroine will experience death repeatedly, and the death scenes will be directly shown through illustrations.

※This work is a fully dubbed fantasy visual novel for gore lovers to savor the delicate text that describes the protagonist's inner despair, the exquisite event pictures full of flesh and blood, and the emotional voice acting.

【Story】

Colt, who comes from an elf village, embarks on an adventurous journey for her seriously ill sister.

But she will encounter various dangerous monsters on the way. Can she escape from this forest safely?

Or will her blood dye this forest red...

【Feature】

  • Hardcore death・grotesque erotic visual novel game
    Various death scenarios: Death from blood loss, predation, petrified destruction, explosion, amputated, penetration by tentacles

—Sharp thorns embedded in the ground penetrated the body,

avaged by monsters and died while unable to move.

—Caught by two monsters, the monsters invaded the body from the pussy,

Died because her abdomen and chest were eaten alive.

—After being petrified, the head, torso, and feet were destroyed in turn,

she turned into dust and died.

—She was caught from behind by a large monster, her arms was eaten and she was brutally raped.

Eventually both arms were torn off,

She died of uterine rupture after enduring a massive creampie.

  • A rich plot of more than 50,000 words.

  • The heroine has full Japanese dubbing.

  • 8 exquisite event CG pictures and 7 memory events.

【Character】

Colt (CV: 秋山はるる)

A cheerful and smart elf girl with excellent archery skills.

She embarked on a journey to heal her sister.

Philum (CV: ゆづきひな。)

Colt's sister, a girl who was born frail and sickly.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains adult content such as sexual behavior, nudity, nakedness, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, predation, genital nudity scenes, blood loss, uterus rupture, interspecies sex, limb destruction, torso dismemberment, etc. It is not suitable for all viewers. The characters in the game are over 20 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
